ygData.subject: RE: Bayle List
ygData.msgSnippet: I hesitated to post a spoiler to the list to ruin it for those that want to do it themselves. If people want me to post my results (and not many object. ... I
ygData.messageBody:
I hesitated to post a spoiler to the list to ruin it for those that want to
do it themselves. If people want me to post my results (and not many object.
:D) then I will.

I WILL tell you that I got an actual item from the quest (handing in the
decoded list to Pietro Zarn) but it isn't that amazing. I *do* wish it fit
in my range slot so I could use the +15 vs magic bonus though. :)

I never handed in the 3 encoded pieces to Kane Bayle -- a friend of mine
did, got a congrats and exp on the first two pieces, asking for the rest,
the he handed in the last, and got .... "thank you very much" and no exp
etc. Sigh.

will write more later
